data.title: GameSpy: Electronic Arts
data.meta_description: Electronic Arts at GameSpy - View Electronic Arts profile, all the games created and published by Electronic Arts plus news about their latest games.
data.text:
Electronic Arts, headquartered in Redwood City, California, is the world's biggest interactive entertainment software company. Founded in 1982, the company develops, publishes and distributes software worldwide for PCs and consoles. Electronic Arts markets its products under multiple brand names: such as EA Games, EA SPORTS, EA Big, Maxis, and others

EA is best-known for its EA Sports software brand, which includes FIFA Soccer, Madden Football, NHL Hockey, Knockout Kings, NBA Live Basketball, Tiger Woods PGA TOUR Golf, Triple Play Baseball, NASCAR, and others.

Battlefield 4 Reveal Imminent

Tweets suggest EA could reveal the next Battlefield today.

Port Authority: Crysis 3

Crysis 3 is a gorgeous game, but can your system handle it?

Crysis 3 Review

Crytek's latest installment in their flagship franchise is fun, but flawed.
